Description:
VIBRANT, AFFORDABLE 4 BEDROOM HOME IN STRATHFIELDSAYE
This vibrant 4-bedroom home is in the ideal location with only a short drive to Strathfieldsaye shops giving you great access to cafes, restaurants, takeaways and supermarket. Plus parks and walking tracks are nearby too.
Offering a tasteful design and quality appointments with a large kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and ample bench space. There are 3 separate living areas, great size master with walk-in-robe and ensuite and a remote double garage with side access for the caravan.
The home has ducted heating, ducting cooling and summer entertaining is catered for with a covered alfresco area directly from the living space.
Enjoy an ideal location and quality, affordable home.
Inspection a must!
Internal area
185m²

Description:
Quality Split-Level Home!
Tucked away at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac behind a beautiful landscaped spring garden, this one has all the right credentials to attract young families or retired couples.
No expense was spared in its construction of the split-level home it actually has 3 levels and it's still in immaculate condition inside and out.
Spacious accommodation includes four bedrooms, two bathrooms, large formal lounge and expansive open family/dining/kitchen areas flanked by outdoor living zones.
Decorative features abound including tiled front verandah and entry hall, anaglypta dado, timber fretwork, bay windows, fancy cornice and ceiling roses and a beautiful Blackwood timber and leadlight feature ceiling in the kitchen.
The kitchen is a chefs delight with gas cooktop, stainless steel electric oven, ample Blackwood cabinetry including roll-up appliance cupboard and corner pantry. The family area boasts a matching Blackwood wall unit for the TV, books and collectables.
The home is equipped with all the expected mod-cons like built-in robes to all bedrooms, ducted heating/cooling and storage tucked into every available space.
Enjoy relaxed outdoor living and entertaining off the kitchen\dining under a covered, paved alfresco area fringed with greenery or relax and recline in the sun on the side verandah off the family room.
The private backyard has a garden shed and rainwater tank while the auto double garage includes a storage room and direct access to the residence.
The approx 871m² lot in the best family surroundings, it's close to LaTrobe University campus, shopping centres, pool, sporting facilities, bushwalking tracks and public transport etc.
Call for a private inspection today.

Description:
Luxury & Scale, A Beautiful Family Home
When it comes to family homes, 8 Bluestone Street proves that bigger is better.
Set on over 2,000 square metres of beautifully landscaped garden this family home offers feature after feature.
With high ceilings throughout and gas ducted heating with refrigerated cooling throughout, your comfort and pleasure are at the forefront of this well-thought-out floor plan. Enter into a light-filled wide hallway with the master suite to the right with its own generous walk-in robe and a well-appointed bathroom with twin basins.
Back out to the left is the first of 3 separate living zones with a more formal lounge distanced from the hustle and bustle of everyday living.
Venture down the hall and the property really begins to shine. You are greeted by pristine white cabinetry and stone benchtops. Featuring sleek matte black finishes and 900 wide appliances, as well as a walk-in pantry equal to the scale of the home.
The light and airy living space looks out to undercover alfresco, which is where you will spend the warmer months when not dipping in the grand swimming pool with heat pump.
Three additional good sized bedrooms all with BIR's, and a second bathroom branch off the hallway toward the rear. Families will love the huge tome come bath time.
The stunning family home offers a third living space or kids retreat, which also opens up to the undercover alfresco area.
The offer in the home itself is completed with a double garage, with internal and rear access, and walk-in linen.
And then we step outside and are greeted by expanses of manicured lawn. The home is well thought out for families with two dedicated, play areas, and the aforementioned pool, which is an absolute show stopper.
The home also features a beautiful fire pit area and 13x7m shedding at the rear of the property, with its own toilet and sink.
This property is gem after gem and needs to be seen to be believed.

Description:
4 Bedroom Plus Study Space, Room For Everyone!
19 National Parade is a fantastic light and bright property for the family, at an affordable price point. Featuring 4 good sized bedrooms plus a study space or home office for the oh-so-important "work from home" space, as well as two separate living zones. There really is room for everyone.
Step inside and enjoy the open-plan living, dining and meals area, with wrap around kitchen at its hub, featuring gas cook-top and electric oven as well as dishwasher, and ample cupboard and bench space, also complete with walk-in pantry.
This versatile space offers access to the rear undercover alfresco area as well as split-system heating and cooling. While the whole house offers ducted heating.
There is also a second large lounge area toward the front of the house, which also works to separate the main bedroom from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The main itself offers walk-in robe, stylish ensuite, & split-system. While the other 3 bedrooms all offer built-in robes.
The double lock up garage is accessible internally which is a very handy feature especially in the depths of winter!
Main bathroom features separate tub and separate toilet, optimal for large, and or young families.
The block itself sits on a quiet corner is a good size at just over 540 square metres, and with the width of the block there is the possibility of side access (STCA) down the track.
We are already getting a lot of enquiry about this property off the back of the coming soon campaign, so if you are interested, don't hesitate! Contact Sacha today!

Description:
Another property sold "off market" by Michael Brooks at McKean McGregor Real Estate.
Another property sold "off market" by Michael Brooks at McKean McGregor Real Estate.
We have multiple parties who missed out on this property, please contact us if you have a similar property or wish to find out further information about this sale or property.
This contemporary family home is only six months old and like new. Positioned in a great neighbourhood, just down the road from playground and childcare centre, the home is within easy reach of bus stops, schools, supermarkets, bakery, train station and golf course.
The master bedroom is positioned off the main entry and offers a walk-in robe and ensuite. Behind the master is a laundry with access to the side yard, and the hallway continues down to a second bedroom with a built-in robe ideal as a home office, nursery or guest room. The remaining two bedrooms can be accessed off the main living area and both rooms feature a built-in robe and are served by a family bathroom.
A formal living area towards the front of the house provides an excellent adults space and beyond this room is a spacious and light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The contemporary kitchen enjoys stone benchtops and a large walk-in pantry.
Outdoors, an alfresco area leads off the family room and includes lights and power providing a space to entertain year-round. The remaining yard is set to lawn and the level allotment offers ample scope for any potential green thumbs.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating
Modern appliances including dishwasher, 900mm oven and five-burner cooktop
Access from shed to rear yard
Excellent investment
Fully enclosed, secure backyard
With quality tenants, paying $400 per week, already in place, this modern home offers an easy rental property for a potential investor. Alternatively, this fresh build in a family-friendly locale is also ideal for a buyer seeking a like-new home with a practical and contemporary design.

Description:
Forever Young
This meticulously presented residence was built as a display home by the highly reputed Glen Loddon Homes. As builders they are renowned for quality, timeless design and fastidious craftsmanship. The family who secured this prized property from the owner-operated building company have cherished the home and are hopeful that you will now enjoy it as much as they have.
The striking street appeal here is evident in the symmetry of the two sash windows either side of the portico. The portico and double garage match the pitch of the main roof line and protrude out to give the facade a double front. These modern, clean lines, quality materials and timeless design elements are very appealing and attractive. The rendered walls enable you to change the entire look of the home with a lick of paint, as market trends or you own tastes and preferences change over time. The place is therefore effectively timeless. It's forever young!
The same is true indoors. The tasteful neutral colours and decor throughout will complement a wide range of furniture, as trends and your needs change over time. The home has been freshly painted and recarpeted in recent years. Ceiling fans and down lights have also been added and the front and rear landscaping are more recent improvements. Enjoy total comfort year round with ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
A formal lounge ticks the (often non-negotiable) box for those looking for a home with two separate living areas, and the dining area flows beautifully to the covered alfresco. Direct access from the garage to the kitchen is a big tick too, as is the kitchen itself. It boasts incredible functionality, optimal use of space and attention to detail such as power points to the island bench and breakfast bar for stools.
You'll wonder how it is that the house is being lived in. Especially when you see the second bathroom and just how untouched it presents. Trust me, it is being lived in; the owners are just very house proud and so it still presents as the display home it first was. The main bedroom is favoured with a walk in robe and ensuite and bedrooms two and three are also well proportioned and have fitted robes.
A roller door to the back wall of the garage enables vehicle entry into the back yard, which is ideal for storing the trailer/boat/caravan off street. There is a 6x3m shed, neat raised garden beds and plenty of grassy play area for your kids, visiting grandchildren or pets. A paved sitting area extends the outdoor dining and living space of the alfresco so that you can enjoy sun or shade as you wish.
Very nearby are: Epsom Village, medical clinic, Chemist Warehouse, Woolworths, Aldi, milk bar, take-away options, and speciality stores, Bunnings, Human Mechanics gym, Bendigo Golf Club and Racecourse. Childcare centres, kindergartens, primary and secondary schools. Parks, play spaces and sporting and recreation reserves. Bendigo Botanic Gardens, Pottery, seasonal pool and Lake Weeroona. As well as the bus network and Epsom Railway station.

Description:
Immaculate family home in a great Huntly location
Located in the extremely popular View Point Estate in Huntly. This well presented 5 year old home offers 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, the main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe. The other 3 bedrooms located at the rear of the home come with built in robes.
The spacious home has 2 living areas, one carpeted lounge and the other with tiled floors. The modern and bright open plan living area leads out to a private outdoor alfresco space for entertaining. The kitchen comes with gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and good sized pantry.
This home is in pristine condition, sitting on a 476sqm block, with a low- maintenance yard. Situated in a quiet street and only a short drive from the Huntly shopping district.
If you're looking for your first home, new investment or even your next affordable family home, look no further. Contact Toby Gray at Ray White Bendigo to book a Private Inspection.
(ENOE)

Description:
Inner City Living with Two Street Frontages
This character filled California Bungalow residence is located in the highly sought after central suburb of Quarry Hill within walking distance of the Bendigo Marketplace, railway station and CBD.
With Quarry Hill offering a lifestyle so highly sought after, you will be very interested to note the rear of this 680sqm (approx.) allotment fronts Little Breen Street. There is already a vehicle crossover in place, and the rectangular block has a substantial cleared area at the back making subdivision a real possibility (STCA).
Behind the established gardens is a charming facade, complete with gracious porch boasting curved details, rope pillars and stunning art deco windows.
Original character statements include high ceilings, coloured glass, art deco cornices and ceiling roses and polished floorboards. The home comprises three bedrooms with a convenient study or playroom, an open plan kitchen/meals and living area as well as a separate formal lounge room. Home comfort is provided by gas heating and split system heating and cooling.
Situated at the rear of the home, the covered timber deck is an ideal spot for entertaining, with views to the Cathedral. There is ample space in the securely fenced back yard for children and pets to play or room to build a big shed/workshop.
Plenty of off street parking is available courtesy of the single garage and long driveway, and parking is also available through the gates from Little Breen Street. A handy garden shed is perfect for storing the mower and tools.
Currently leased to excellent long term tenants on a fixed term until September 2020. A combination of period charm and exceptional convenience makes this property an appealing prospect to investors, future wealth creators, and owner occupiers alike.

Description:
Inspired Style, Pure Indulgence!
Indulge in the Architectural brilliance of this stunning two-story, renowned Steve Bish build. This 5-bedroom modern family masterpiece is positioned on an elevated block in one of Bendigo's most prestigious streets and offering breathtaking panoramic views of Bendigo's CBD.
Every element is infused with the utmost quality, sleek high-end materials and a seamless flow from indoors to out creates a sense of everyday luxury superbly tailored to family life.
The lower quarters offers an entire guest wing with a large living area/cinema room and a massive bedroom with built-in robes. This lower wing comes with its own external entrance making it an ideal room for an older teenager to come and go as they please.
Stunning hardwood floors sweep through an expansive upper level. A spectacular living domain with a stylish yet extremely functional kitchen that comes with a huge walk-in pantry. The kitchen spills out to the glorious alfresco entertaining area. This cleverly built alfresco has deliberately been placed in the centre of the home with the accommodation wings on either side giving you glorious views of the backyard and an abundance of natural light from every angle of the home.
Upstairs accommodation comprises of four large bedrooms including the master suite which provides a private haven for busy parents including a massive walk-in robe, hotel-style ensuite with double vanities, separate toilet and luxury shower. The remaining three bedrooms all have floor-ceiling built0in robes and share an equally lavish second bathroom with a modern freestanding bath and a walk-in shower.
Both the front and back gardens are landscaped beautifully, including the front which recently had whole new modern landscaping done which is truly amazing.
Custom built to the owner's discerning specifications; this designer home impresses on every level. Polished concrete in the grand entrance, double glazed windows (recently tinted), 8ft doors, zone-controlled ducted refrigerated cooling/heating throughout, ducted vacuum system, lots of storage throughout and top of the line fully integrated 4K CCTV security system.
Only your inspection will allow full appreciation of such a stellar home in this enviable location.

Description:
STRATHDALE
Lot 34 Elwood Drive | 825 m2 | $340,000
Magnificent homes already adorn the first stage of this development; the opening of the final stage offers you an opportunity to live minutes from the Bendigo city centre with a delightful National Park backdrop. Located in Strathdale off the prestigious Harley Street end of town, the ready-to-build on blocks are a must to see. Imagine waking to the sound of native birds singing in the grand tall trees of the National Park and taking a walk along the wide trail smelling the freshness of the eucalypts and admiring the native animal life. All while having the security of knowing your block has a low BAL. If this is not enough, take a short stroll down the road and you will be at picturesque Kennington Reservoir and a little further to Beischer Park where you will find soccer grounds, netball courts, a playground and parkland.
Elwood Drive certainly offers the astute buyer a chance to live in one of Bendigos best locations. With two well established shopping centres in Strathdale, a State Primary School, a Private School, a Kindergarten and Day Care, and many sporting facilities so close, you could walk to any facility that you might need. Public transport is very handy and the city centre is only minutes away.
The following documentation is available upon request:

Soil Information

Description:
Prestigious 20 Acre Lots 15 min Bendigo
Located near Axedale these exceptional 20 acre lots are perfect for your new home development plans.
Occupying a prime location adjacent to the Axe Creek, each of these properties is a perfect blank canvas to bring your dream to fruition. The most difficult decision may be selecting your most preferred lot from the three on offer.
Zoned Rural Living, the lots abound in character with gently undulating topography, a selection of elevated home sites, excellent fencing, and relaxing rural views encompassing Mt.Alexander and Mt.Herbert. One lot already has a dam with excellent natural catchment and another has an existing shed which is perfect for lifestyle and storage while you await the completion of your new home.
The highly fertile soils are a great foundation for whatever hobby farm pursuits you may contemplate, including horses, sheep, cattle and most agricultural and horticultural activities.
The lots have excellent all-weather road access to the boundary and mains power is available to each of the lots. A historic ruin on the newly created access road stands as a landmark and a fabulous reminder of early European settlement in the area.
Located just off the McIvor Highway and 3km to Axedale, this is an enviable location to enjoy an array of activities and convenience such as the Campaspe River, Axedale Tavern, General Store, Golf Club, Tennis Courts, Primary School and O'Keefe Rail Trail.
LOT 1 - UNDER CONTRACT
- 8.41 ha / 20.7 Ac
- Very private.
- Extensive frontage to Axe Creek.
LOT 2 - $375,000
- 8.08 Ha / 19.9 Ac
- Existing steel shed.
- Approximately 160m of Axe Creek frontage.
LOT 3 - $350,000 - $375,000
- 8.18 Ha / 20.2 Ac
- Large dam.

Description:
Plenty of Room to Move and Grow
In the popular Strathfieldsaye locale, a grand circular drive welcomes you to this spacious family home. At the end of a quiet court and set on just under an acre of land, this excellent property includes:
Four bedrooms with generous built in robes, main bedroom with walk in robe and newly renovated ensuite. Fourth bedroom currently set up as home office space.
Fully renovated main bathroom featuring luxurious spa bath and floor to ceiling tiles.
Open plan family living and dining areas with solid fuel wood heater and ceiling fan.
Second spacious lounge area flows from the front entry, filled with an abundance of natural light and views over the low maintenance grounds.
Generous kitchen space with an ample storage, walk in pantry, electric cooktop and wall oven, dishwasher with an outlook over the picturesque back yard.
Enormous under cover outdoor entertaining area, quality built and installed by Ultimate Patios Bendigo with concrete base - perfect for evening meals and family gatherings.
Double roller door garage with concrete flooring and additional workshop space.
Water tank, front and rear veranda's, lush grass areas and established garden beds.
A large shed with concrete floor and power and plenty of space to park the caravan, boat trailer or truck if need be.
Just moments away from Strathfieldsaye shops and schooling, this home would be excellent for raising a family, with the addition of a bus stop just under 400 meters away, walking tracks, sporting facilities and so much more. Inspection a must to appreciate the overall charm and peaceful lifestyle this property offers. Enquire with the Heard & Co. Sales Team to arrange your private inspection today.

Description:
Argyle House
Built in the late 1800s this beautiful home has been held by the same family for 100 years and is now being offered for sale. The home boasts 14 foot ceilings, pressed metal ceilings and cornices, original open fireplaces, a hidden cellar and many more features to discover. The distinctive weatherboard and timber detail façade wait to be refreshed and returned to its former glory. With the positioning of the home being on the boundary there is plenty of room for extending and the chance to create your dream home within walking distance to Bendigo CBD.
Inside features
Wide hallway with timber fretwork
Timber floorboards
Instant gas hot water
Pressed metal ceilings and cornices
14 foot ceilings
Ducted gas heating and solid fuel heating
Outside features
531m2 block
Off street parking
Beautiful street appeal with Original facade
This home is located within an easy walk to Bendigo CBD, train station, schools and sporting fields.
Settlement 30 or 60 days.
For section 32 document, text the word Palmerston to 0488 810 392
Vendors will consider offers prior to auction

Description:
Fantastic Family Home Amazing Shed
When only the best will do, this custom designed and built quality brick veneer home is one to be desired. Positioned in a convenient Epsom locale, walking distance to Botanical Gardens, hotels, schools and only minutes away from White Hills shopping precinct and still only a short drive to Bendigo CBD.
Features include;
Three spacious bedrooms plus a study, or easily large enough to be a fourth bedroom
Master with bay window feature, walk in robe, spilt system unit and fully renovated ensuite with corner shower, vanity and toilet
Second bedroom with ceiling fan, large built in robes and direct access door to the main bathroom, creating an excellent semi-ensuite arrangement
Spacious kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven, ample cupboard and bench space
Open plan dining and second large living area with an abundance of natural light, overlooking the excellent, well maintained rear yard
Quality fittings and fixtures throughout, ducted gas heating plus additional four split system units, front formal lounge room
Main bathroom with shower, bath, vanity basin and dual entry doors from hallway and bedroom two, separate toilet located nearby to the large laundry
Step outside to the fantastic pergola area, fully paved, retaining walls, lush lawns with pop up sprinkler system, huge hedge offering screened privacy, veggie patch and more...
A double garage with automatic roller door, plus vehicle access straight through to the rear yard to a marvellous shedding arrangement comprising of a 3m x 7m workshop with lighting, split system unit and second wing offering a 7m x 5m shed with a height of 4.5m (approx.)
Additional parking is also available in a carport attached to the bricked garage with secure gate, great for the boat, caravan or alike
Many more features to discover at this terrific property, certainly will not last long, get in touch today to book your private inspection.

Description:
Quality From Start To Finish
Set on over 500m2 and landscaped from front to back fence, 11 Ilby Street Huntly is certainly one to check out.
You will notice the quality as soon as you step inside. Master bedroom with WIR and ensuite with double vanity.
To the right you will find the double lock up garage with internal access and rear access.
Further through you will find bedrooms 2 & 3 with built in robes, while at the front of the home a large fourth bedroom offers flexibility as a second living space.
Families will appreciate the master bathroom with large tub and separate toilet.
Step through to the rear of the home and the property really shines, entertainers kitchen with 900 wide gas cooking and range hood. The stylishly designed and well planned kitchen offers stone bench-tops and breakfast bar while overlooking the large, sun-drenched living and dining area. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling ensure you are comfortable all year round, while solar panels help to absorb any future power price hikes.
Large windows overlook the back yard and huge undercover alfresco area.
Sure to impress upon inspection, please contact Sacha and the team to arrange a time to view 11 Ilby Street.

Description:
Heart of Huntly - Only 1 left!
Located in the Heart of Huntly, the opportunity to build your dream home in a central, safe community awaits.
With an appealing price tag, there is only one remaining great-sized block left.
Country living on the city's fringe, surrounded by families, schools, sporting facilities public transport, and shopping at your doorstep.
This level, flat block is ready for building to commence.
Boasting tranquillity and serenity, Huntly is emerging as a trendy haven of easy-going living while still only a short drive to the city. With the new government assistance to eligible First Home Buyers, give way to your creativity and design your future today.
- Great, central location
- Country living with all the essentials
- Safe, close-knit community
- Short drive to Bendigo
- Great sized allotments
- Close to amenities & schools
- Easy access to Public Transport
- Nearby sporting facilities

** COVID 19 **
We welcome you to attend our properties for inspections, however, we request that you only attend if not under any self-isolation conditions and are fit and healthy to do so. While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property. We require attendees to maintain a respectable distance (1.5m apart) from the other individuals present. Finally, we request that you please refrain from touching items, fixtures and doors; if there is something that you require assistance with, we are happy to help you.
If you are coming from Melbourne or the Mitchell Shire please understand that we are unable to conduct an inspection with you. If you contact our office we will be happy to arrange a virtual tour of the property for you.

Address: 382 Wild Cherry Road Lockwood South VIC 3551
Description:
Farmlet Property With A Lot That You Want
Picture yourself sitting down in the cool of the day on the outdoor area overlooking the 8 acres and a beautiful dam with wild animals coming in for a drink.
This property is made for those people wanting a tree-change or a property where they can pursue some limited agricultural pursuits to encourage the land to continue to be people friendly.
It lends itself to lavender farming or olive growing. There is plenty of land around the family sized 4 bedroom house that can be continued to be developed as mainly a native garden to encourage the native fauna and a host of different birds.
Inside this steel framed home are 4 bedrooms of good size and a study.
There are two living rooms and a Shaker style kitchen with a huge dining area.
Also in this room is a wood fired stove for heating with comfy chairs to relax in on those cool wet days that can happen in winter.
The internal house is serviced by a built in ducted heating and cooling system to ensure your comfort all year round.
The house has had all older draperies removed and they are replaced by pull down blinds to control the heat etc; this makes the house suitable for those with breathing problems.
Outside there is a country style garden and five huge rainwater tanks to help with keeping the garden growing. There is a shed to accommodate three vehicles and storage as well as one that can take up to 10 vehicles, boats or be used as construction base for work-shopping. There is a tree
lined entry to the property of native trees which could be improved if necessary.
This property has many features which are well worth a look when considering your future place of living.
* Large 4 bedroom home
* Big kitchen & dining area
* Gas log fire in dining
* Ducted cooling
* Concrete alfresco with scenic views
* Set on approx 3.5 hectares
* 5 x 28,000 ltr water tanks
* 2 megalitre dam
* Shed 1: 18 x 9 mtrs with power & concrete
* Shed 2: 14 x 6 mtrs with power & concrete
* Quiet surroundings with plenty of space
* Ideal for car enthusiast
